==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ゆう|めい|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
Likely from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ゆうめい}} compound {{m|zh|有名|tr=hjuw<sup>X</sup> mjeng|lit=to have + name}}.  Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} reading ''yǒumíng''.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|ゆうめい|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

===Adjective===
{{ja-adj|infl=na|ゆうめい|hhira=いうめい}}

# [[famous]], [[renowned]], [[well-known]], [[celebrated]]
# having a [[name]], [[named]]

====Antonyms====
* {{ja-r|無名|むめい}}: [[namelessness]]; [[lack]] of [[fame]]
